Applicant : Bach, Shannon
School (district) : South Junior High (Boise school district)
Role(s) : Middle School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : I am really interested in agrigulture. I have a background in motorized vehicles so I would like driving tractors, learning about the watering systems etc. I would also like fire prevention work. I want to get outside of my classroom bubble and experience the blue collor jobs.. hard work!

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I don't have work force experience. It would be nice to see the expectations that are set up in industries. I think work ethic, and skills based knowledge are super helpful.
